patthana21.13:4.1: Nasārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:5.1: Nasārammaṇaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:6.1: Naanārammaṇaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:6.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.13:7.1: Nocittaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā citto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:9.1: Nacetasikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cetasiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:11.1: Nacittasampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:13.1: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:15.1: Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:17.1: Nacittasahabhuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:19.1: Nacittānuparivattiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:21.1: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:23.1: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:25.1: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:27.1: Naajjhattikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:29.1: Nanoupādā nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā noupādā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.13:31.1: Naanupādinnaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anupādinno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
